MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW4 postcode area of Crewe , affecting properties in Main Road, Mill Lane, Hermitage Lane and surrounding areas . Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded cable and the extent of the repair that is required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:56 AM on 27th November 2020.
